name: Ring
description: A ring that can have magical properties.

name: Amulet
description: An amulet that can have magical properties.

name: Torch
description: Increases vision radius by 3x and detects hidden items for 120s.

name: Firebolt Skillbook
description: A spellbook for casting small fire arrows.

name: Charged Bolt Skillbook
description: A spellbook for casting random lightning bolts.

name: Healing Skillbook
description: A holy spellbook for restoring HP.

name: Holy Bolt Skillbook
description: A holy arrow spellbook effective against undead.

name: Inferno Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a front-facing flamethrower.

name: Fireball Skillbook
description: A spellbook for an exploding fireball.

name: Lightning Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a piercing bolt of lightning.

name: Stone Curse Skillbook
description: A spellbook that petrifies the target.

name: Flash Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a surrounding electrical blast.

name: Flame Wave Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a moving wall of fire.

name: Guardian Skillbook
description: A spellbook to summon a fireball-firing turret.

name: Mana Shield Skillbook
description: A spellbook that absorbs damage with MP.

name: Nova Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a circular lightning wave.

name: Golem Skillbook
description: A spellbook to summon a stone giant.

name: Apocalypse Skillbook
description: A spellbook for a total explosion.

name: Ring of Intelligence
description: A ring that gives +5 Intelligence bonus.

name: Belt of Fortitude
description: A belt that gives +5 Vitality bonus.

name: Ancient Armor
description: Legendary heavy armor with ancient magic.

name: Rage Skillbook
description: A book for learning Barbarian's Rage.

name: Repair Skillbook
description: A book for Warrior's equipment maintenance.

name: Disarm Skillbook
description: A manual for Rogue's disarming skills.

name: Recharge Skillbook
description: A manual for Sorcerer's magic recharging.

name: Angel's Feather
description: Prevents item destruction once on failure.

name: Dark Crystal
description: Promotes item grade from Normal to Magic.

name: Butcher's Cleaver
description: A giant bloodied cleaver used by the Butcher.

name: Undead Crown
description: A crown once worn by the King of the Dead.

name: Soulstone
description: A red gem containing the soul of Diablo.
